subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: This was the 30th year for cycling’s ultimate test — the 3,000-mile Race Across America, which takes participants from California to Maryland in less than 12 days.
snippet: This was the 30th year for cycling’s ultimate test — the 3,000-mile Race Across America, which takes participants from California to Maryland in less than 12 days.
